    FOKUS questionnaire schema

Get raw supplemental date-specific FOKUS questionnaire data

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
raw_qstnr_suppl.Rd

Returns a structured list of the raw supplemental date-specific FOKUS questionnaire data for the specified ballot date.

Usage

raw_qstnr_suppl(ballot_date = all_ballot_dates)

Arguments

ballot_date

FOKUS-covered ballot date. One of

  • "2018-09-23"

  • "2018-11-25"

  • "2019-10-20"

  • "2020-09-27"

  • "2020-10-18"

  • "2021-11-28"

  • "2023-06-18"

Value

A strict list.

See also

Other raw questionnaire data functions: raw_pick_right(), raw_qstnr_suppl_arguments(), raw_qstnr_suppl_argument(), raw_qstnr_suppl_election_name(), raw_qstnr_suppl_elections(), raw_qstnr_suppl_election(), raw_qstnr_suppl_lvl_canton(), raw_qstnr_suppl_lvl(), raw_qstnr_suppl_main_motives(), raw_qstnr_suppl_mode(), raw_qstnr_suppl_proposal_name(), raw_qstnr_suppl_proposal(), raw_qstnr_suppl_skill_questions(), raw_qstnr_suppl_skill_question(), raw_qstnrs_suppl, raw_qstnr

Examples

fokus:::raw_qstnr_suppl(ballot_date = "2018-09-23") %$% mode
#> $aargau
#> $aargau$invitation
#> [1] "online" "print" 
#> 
#> $aargau$n
#> [1] 8000
#> 
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch$date
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch$date$invitation
#> [1] "2018-09-18"
#> 
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch$date$reminder
#> [1] "2018-10-02"
#> 
#> 
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch$type
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch$type$invitation
#> [1] "B"
#> 
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch$type$prepaid_reply_envelope
#> [1] "A"
#> 
#> $aargau$postal_dispatch$type$reminder
#> [1] "B"
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $aargau$reminder
#> [1] "online" "print" 
#> 
#>
